            GridlineWidthBottom =1
            UnknownProp = {311 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,1 } Begin
                0x00
            End
        End
        Begin FormHeader
            Height =1200
            BackColor =-2147483633

            GUID = Begin
                0x2f17f6f17a399844a5e710e0c9e115f5
            End

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
' Created 03 2008 for SciFairMaster Rev 2.3.4.1
'  Program process:
'    In regard to Judges assigned to Exhibits in THIS PROGRAM, The data is entered,
'  edited and deleted from the ExhibitData form (Table)  The records in the ExhibitJudges subform
'  (ExhibitJudges table)  is derived from ExhibitData.
' Data is never entered into ExhibitJudges
' Each update in ExhibitData is then copied to ExhibitJudges
' ExhibitData sort should not be important
' ExhibitJudges is kept sorted by EXN, but never sorted by JUN.
' The first record with an EXN represents J-1 in ExhibitData, second is J-2 etc

' Private Type OldSFRecord
'    WholeRec As String * 28    'Open/close old file format
' End Type
' Private InRec As OldSFRecord
' Private OutRec As OldSFRecord
Dim DoOnlyOneJCAT As Boolean
Dim JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT As String
Dim dbsSciFair As Database  ' Set to open database.
Dim ExhJudges As Recordset  ' From ExhibitJudges (score cards)
Dim JudgeData As Recordset  ' From Judges - various criteria close and open with new criteria
Dim ExhData As Recordset    ' From ExhibitData - various criteria close and open with new criteria
Dim JuTyCats As Recordset   'From JudgeTypeCategories - all records
Dim Categories As Recordset       ' from Categories
Dim JudgeTypes As Recordset    ' JudgeTypes

Dim Num_records As Integer  'Number of records in JudgeExhibits for a given Exhibit
Dim criteria As String      ' used everywhere must set before use
Dim ii As Integer            ' used everywhere must set before use
Dim curExn As Integer       ' set for each exhibit record
Dim curNumJu As Integer     ' "
Dim curJ1 As Integer        ' "
Dim curJ2 As Integer        ' "
Dim curJ3 As Integer        ' "
Dim curJ4 As Integer        ' "
Dim DoAssign As Boolean
Dim DidAllCatsNoErrors As Boolean
Dim CanceledOneCat As Boolean

Private Function GetRandJudge(Exnum As Integer) As Integer
  ' Get one random Judge for Exhibit exnum from judges with the same JCAT
  ' ExhData must be set to the current exn
  ' curJx values must be set to same as current Exhibit record
  ' Judgedata must be selected for Active and JCAT matching exnum
  On Error GoTo FuncError
     ' this uses the current record of the open ExhData recordset (all exhibits in JCAT)
     ' and open Judgedata (all Active Judges in JCAT)  to pick a random judge
     ' for the exnum in the call. The method used is:
     '1. Build a table of Judges NOT already used in this exhibit.
     '2. Remove those with the highest number of Exhibits already assigned but keep at least two
     '3. Pick one, Increment the NumExn and return (If not used by calling routine, that
     '   routine must decrement the NumExn.
   Dim Avail(2, 999) As Integer  ' Jun and NumEx of non assigned judges
   Dim SelFrom(2, 99) As Integer ' after eliminating those with high selections
   Dim index As Integer
   ' curJ1 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_1), 1, ExhData!J_1)
   ' set GetRandJudge to error value
   GetRandJudge = 1
   If ExhData!EXN <> Exnum Then
     MsgBox "Program error in GetRandJudge = Exn not matching current selected Exhibit record"
     Exit Function
   End If
   ' Get a list of judges NOT assigned to this exhibit
   With JudgeData
      .MoveFirst
      index = 0
      Do While Not .EOF
          'curJx will be 1 (if Null) or 1 if set to 1 (not assigned) or a Judgenumber
          If !JUN <> curJ1 Then
            If !JUN <> curJ2 Then
              If !JUN <> curJ3 Then
                If !JUN <> curJ4 Then
                  index = index + 1    ' start at index = 1
                  Avail(1, index) = !JUN
                  If IsNull(!NUMEX) Then
                    .Edit
                    !NUMEX = 0
                    .Update
                  End If
                  Avail(2, index) = !NUMEX
                End If
              End If
            End If
          End If
        .MoveNext
      Loop
   End With
   ' at this point Avail has only judges not assigned to this Exhibit
  If index = 0 Then
    MsgBox "Error in GetRandJudge: No judges left that are not assigned Judges < Num Jud per exhibit"
    GetRandJudge = 1
    Exit Function
  End If
' now let me eliminate those judges who have the most exhibits
 Dim MaxNuex As Integer
 Dim MinNuex As Integer
 Dim NumMax As Integer
 Dim NumMin As Integer
 Dim NumLTMax As Integer
 Dim NumGTMin As Integer
 Dim iSel As Integer
 Dim RanNu As Integer

DoAgain:
 NumMax = 0   ' the number of exhibits with the same (maximum) NUMEX (not used)
 NumMin = 0   ' the number of exhibits with the same (minimum ) NUMEX
 NumLTMax = 0  ' not used
 NumGTMin = 0   ' not used
 MaxNuex = -1    ' used to set the value if Max NUMEX
 MinNuex = 9999  ' used to set the value of Min NUMEX
 ' find max NUMEX  and how many assigned
 ' fin min NUMEX  and how many assigned
 For ii = 1 To index
   If Avail(2, ii) > MaxNuex Then
     MaxNuex = Avail(2, ii)
     NumMax = 0
   End If
   If Avail(2, ii) = MaxNuex Then NumMax = NumMax + 1
   If Avail(2, ii) < MinNuex Then
     MinNuex = Avail(2, ii)
     NumMin = 0
   End If
   If Avail(2, ii) = MinNuex Then NumMin = NumMin + 1
 Next
'   Pick one  or more to select
'  NOTE:  since judges are picked randomly, eventually a RANDUM Judge wil
'     end up being the single one with the least number of exhibits
'     or several will randomly be in the list having the least number assigned
'     This list is random so selecting THE ONE or from the LIST is still a
'     Random process of sorts.  This method assures that all judges will get
'     within one exhibit or same number of exhibits to judge
   If NumMin >= 1 Then
    ' rebuild the avail list to include only the exhibits with the min value of NUMEX
    ' This will include all judges (first time) or fewer or only one judge
    ' just assign one from this list  If there is only one, the random choice will get that one
    iSel = 0
    For ii = 1 To index
      If Avail(2, ii) = MinNuex Then
         iSel = iSel + 1
         Avail(2, iSel) = Avail(2, ii)
         Avail(1, iSel) = Avail(1, ii)
      End If
    Next
    index = iSel
   End If
'To produce random integers in a given range, use this formula:
'Int((upperbound - lowerbound + 1) * Rnd + lowerbound)
'Here, upperbound is the highest number in the range, and lowerbound is the lowest number in the range.
  RanNu = Int(index * Rnd + 1)
  GetRandJudge = Avail(1, RanNu)
  If GetRandJudge = 0 Then
    MsgBox "got 0 for GetRandJudge() index = " & index & "  randomindex = " & RanNu
    GetRandJudge = 1
    Exit Function
  End If
DoAssign:
  With JudgeData
     Dim crit As String
     crit = "JUN = " & GetRandJudge
     .FindFirst (crit)
     .Edit
     !NUMEX = Avail(2, RanNu) + 1
     .Update
  End With
  Exit Function
FuncError:
  MsgBox "Error in GetRandJudge() = " & Err.Description
  GetRandJudge = 1
End Function

Private Sub UpDateExhJudges()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Assumes that ExhibitJudges table is empty or if Not it empties that table
  ' creates ExhibitJudges Table from data in ExhibitData
  ' this is called AFTER Auto Assign so ExhJudges should be empty
  ' but just to make sure
  Screen.MousePointer = 11
  Dim tempreccnt As Integer
'  On Error GoTo NoAssigns
'    ExhJudges.MoveFirst
'    ExhJudges.MoveLast '  populate record count
'    ExhJudges.MoveFirst
'  On Error GoTo subError
  tempreccnt = ExhJudges.RecordCount
  ' --------- create new ExhibitJudges data ----------
  ' First delete all the current records
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
  If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then    '  Do NOT Delete records if doing only one
    If tempreccnt <> 0 Then
       With ExhJudges
         .MoveFirst
         Do While Not .EOF
           .Delete
           .MoveNext
         Loop
       End With
    End If
  End If
  ' now do all exhibits and set records into Exhjudges
  ExhData.MoveFirst
  If Not ExhData.EOF Then
   Do While Not ExhData.EOF
    curExn = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!EXN), 0, ExhData!EXN)
    curNumJu = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!NUMJUDGES), 0, ExhData!NUMJUDGES)
    curJ1 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_1), 0, ExhData!J_1)
    curJ2 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_2), 0, ExhData!J_2)
    curJ3 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_3), 0, ExhData!J_3)
    curJ4 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_4), 0, ExhData!J_4)
      ' Add records to Exhibit Judges ONLY if made assigns
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
    If (DoOnlyOneJCAT = False) Or (DoOnlyOneJCAT = True And ExhData!JCAT = JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT) Then
      If IIf(IsNull(curNumJu), 0, curNumJu) > 0 Then
       With ExhJudges
        For ii = 1 To curNumJu  ' Exhibit data should be clean i.e. no J_X set beyond NUMJUDGES
         Select Case ii
          Case 1
           .AddNew
           !EXN = curExn
           !JUN = curJ1
           !FYR = FairYear()
           .Update
          Case 2
           .AddNew
           !EXN = curExn
           !JUN = curJ2
           !FYR = FairYear()
           .Update
          Case 3
           .AddNew
           !EXN = curExn
           !JUN = curJ3
           !FYR = FairYear()
           .Update
          Case 4
           .AddNew
           !EXN = curExn
           !JUN = curJ4
           !FYR = FairYear()
           .Update
          Case other
         End Select
        Next
       End With
      End If  ' if numjudges > 0
    End If   '    if DO ONLY ONE
    ExhData.MoveNext
   Loop
  End If
  Form.Refresh
  Screen.MousePointer = 0
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
   If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
    If DidAllCatsNoErrors = False Then
      MsgBox "Judges Assignments are INCOMPLETE!  " & vbCrLf & _
           "You must do a complete assignment before you print SCORE FORMS!"
    Else  ' DES 5.0.1  changed message.
      MsgBox "Judge Assignments ARE COMPLETE!" & vbCrLf & _
      " If this is the final successful Assignment:" & vbdrlf & _
      "  You may now print the Judge Scoring Forms"

    End If
   Else  '  DO ONLY ONE
     ' no message needed
   End If
  Exit Sub
NoAssigns:
  Form.Refresh
  DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
  MsgBox "Error:  No Assignments were made. ExhibitJudges Table Empty!"
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "Error in UpDateExhJudges() = " & Err.Description & " exhibit = " & curExn & vbCrLf & _
       "jud pos = " & ii & "  J1= " & curJ1 & "  J2= " & curJ2 & "  J3= " & curJ3 & "  J4= " & curJ4
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub UpDateExhData()
       On Error GoTo SubError
       If Num_records = 0 Then
          Form![Exhibitdata.NUMJUDGES] = Null
          Form![Exhibitdata.J_1] = Null
          Form![Exhibitdata.J_2] = Null
          Form![Exhibitdata.J_3] = Null
          Form![Exhibitdata.J_4] = Null
          Exit Sub
       End If
       With ExhJudges
          Dim lcnt As Integer
          lcnt = 1
          .Requery
          .MoveLast
          .MoveFirst
          Do While Not .EOF
           If !EXN = curExn Then
             Select Case lcnt
             Case 1
               Form![Exhibitdata.J_1] = IIf(!JUN = 1, Null, !JUN)
             Case 2
               Form![Exhibitdata.J_2] = IIf(!JUN = 1, Null, !JUN)
             Case 3
               Form![Exhibitdata.J_3] = IIf(!JUN = 1, Null, !JUN)
             Case 4
               Form![Exhibitdata.J_4] = IIf(!JUN = 1, Null, !JUN)
             Case other
               MsgBox "Error: More than 4 entries in ExhibitJudges for EXN " & curExn
               Exit Do
             End Select
             lcnt = lcnt + 1
             If lcnt > Num_records Then
               For lcnt = lcnt To 4
                 Select Case lcnt
                 Case 1
                   Form![Exhibitdata.J_1] = Null
                 Case 2
                   Form![Exhibitdata.J_2] = Null
                 Case 3
                   Form![Exhibitdata.J_3] = Null
                 Case 4
                   Form![Exhibitdata.J_4] = Null
                 Case other
                    MsgBox "Error: More than 4 entries in ExhibitJudges for EXN " & curExn
                     Exit Do
                  End Select
               Next
               Exit Do
             End If
           End If
         .MoveNext
         Loop
       End With
       'Form.Refresh
       Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox "Program Error in UpDateExhData()"
End Sub


Private Function ExnRecords(theExn As Integer) As Integer
   ' counts the number of records in ExhibitJudges with exhibit number theExn
    ExnRecords = 0
    On Error GoTo NoRecords
    ExhJudges.MoveLast
    ExhJudges.MoveFirst
    If ExhJudges.RecordCount = 0 Then Exit Function
   On Error GoTo FuncError
    If Not ExhJudges.EOF Then ' just opened should not be EOF unless empty
       With ExhJudges
        ' .MoveFirst
          Do While Not .EOF
           If !EXN = theExn Then
             ExnRecords = ExnRecords + 1
           End If
         .MoveNext
         Loop
       End With
    End If
 Exit Function
FuncError:
  MsgBox ("Program Error in function ExnRecords")
  Exit Function
NoRecords:
  Exit Function
End Function


Private Sub btnAddJun_Click()
  MsgBox " To Increase the number of assigned Judges, Enter a larger number for NUMJUDGES"
' can not get this to work
   tbNUMJUDGES.SetFocus
'   Dim newvalue As String
'   newvalue = tbNUMJUDGES + 1
'   SendKeys (newvalue & vbCrLf)
End Sub

Private Sub btnAssignNewExhibits_Click()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If MsgBox("This Option Finds Exhibits with No Judges Assigned Then:" & vbCrLf & _
          "Assigns Judges to these Exhibits." & vbCrLf & _
          "Then Displays the Exhibit Number and Judge Numbers Assigned for each Exhibit." & vbCrLf & _
          "Use this option to assign Judges to LATE ENTRIES ONLY!", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
          "Assign Judges to LATE EXHIBITS") = vbNo Then Exit Sub
   ' do while not eof on exhibit data
   'If NUMJUDGES = 0 Then
     ' display the exhibit num and title
     ' get Num Judges to assign
      ' for num judges to assign
         ' get random judge for exhibit jcat for num judges
      'display the exhibit num, title and judges assigned
   ' loop on exhibits
  Dim FoundOneNA As Boolean
  FoundOneNA = False
  With ExhData
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF   '                                                    LOOP THRU EXHIBITS
      ' for each exhibit with this category:
      ' for each judge to be assigned
      If IIf(IsNull(!NUMJUDGES), 0, !NUMJUDGES) = 0 Then
        FoundOneNA = True
        Dim NumToAssign As Integer
        Dim GetInput1 As String
        Dim Msgx As String
        Msgx = "For Exhibit " & !EXN & ", make a NEW SCORE FORMS for these Assignments:" & vbCrLf
GetanotherNum:
        GetInput1 = InputBox("Exhibit " & !EXN & " Not Assigned" & vbCrLf & _
                        "Enter Number of Judges to Assign", "Number of Judges", 3)
        If GetInput1 = "" Then
          MsgBox "Operation Canceled"
          GoTo CancelExit
        End If
        NumToAssign = GetInput1
        If NumToAssign < 1 Or NumToAssign > 4 Then
           MsgBox "Number of Judges must be 1 to 4"
           GoTo GetanotherNum
        End If
        JudgeData.Close
        criteria = "SELECT * FROM [Judges] WHERE [STATUS] = 'A' AND [JCAT] = '" & !JCAT & "'"
        Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
        curExn = !EXN
        .Edit
        !J_1 = Null
        curJ1 = 1
        !J_2 = Null
        curJ2 = 1
        !J_3 = Null
        curJ3 = 1
        !J_4 = Null
        curJ4 = 1
        .Update
        For ij = 1 To NumToAssign
         ' update to current status
          curJ1 = IIf(IsNull(!J_1), 1, !J_1)
          curJ2 = IIf(IsNull(!J_2), 1, !J_2)
          curJ3 = IIf(IsNull(!J_3), 1, !J_3)
          curJ4 = IIf(IsNull(!J_4), 1, !J_4)
          RndJu = GetRandJudge(!EXN)
          If RndJu = 1 Then
             Screen.MousePointer = 0
             MsgBox "Judge Not Assigned OR.. Judge # 1 is set active! Bad ERROR, Fix and redo this action."
             GoTo SubError
          End If
          Select Case ij
            Case 1
               .Edit
               !J_1 = RndJu
               .Update
                Msgx = Msgx & " Exn: " & !EXN & "  Jun = " & RndJu & vbCrLf
            Case 2
               .Edit
               !J_2 = RndJu
               .Update
                Msgx = Msgx & " Exn: " & !EXN & "  Jun = " & RndJu & vbCrLf
            Case 3
               .Edit
               !J_3 = RndJu
               .Update
                Msgx = Msgx & " Exn: " & !EXN & "  Jun = " & RndJu & vbCrLf
            Case 4
               .Edit
               !J_4 = RndJu
               .Update
                Msgx = Msgx & " Exn: " & !EXN & "  Jun = " & RndJu & vbCrLf
            Case other
               Screen.MousePointer = 0
               MsgBox "Error: NumjudgesThisCategory must be less than 5 (1 to 4)"
               DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
               DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
               GoTo SubError
          End Select
          '  Add the record to ExhibitJudges
          ExhJudges.AddNew
            ExhJudges!EXN = !EXN
            ExhJudges!JUN = RndJu
            ExhJudges!FYR = FairYear()     'rev 5.3.0    missed this on last revision
          ExhJudges.Update
         
         Next  ' do next ij   ( judge)
         .Edit
         !NUMJUDGES = NumToAssign
         .Update
         Form.Refresh
         Msgx = Msgx & vbCrLf & "DO NOT CLICK [OK] Until you have NOTED all exhibits that require a NEW SCORE FORM"
         MsgBox Msgx
      End If ' Num Judges = 0
      .MoveNext
    Loop                 '                                                   LOOP THRU EXHIBITS
  End With
  If FoundOneNA = False Then
    MsgBox "All Exhibits are Assigned"
  Else
    MsgBox "Completed Assignments for New Exhibits" & vbCrLf & _
           "PreSlug New Score Forms for ONLY the New Exhibits NEXT! (if applicable)"
    
  End If
CancelExit:
  JudgeData.Close
  Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("Judges", dbOpenDynaset)

   Exit Sub
SubError:
  JudgeData.Close
  Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("Judges", dbOpenDynaset)
  MsgBox "Error in btnAssignNewExhibits: " & Err.Description

End Sub

Private Sub btnChangeJun_Click()
  MsgBox " To Change a Judge Numbers" & vbCrLf & _
  "  First Delete The Old Judge(s) (Decrease the value of NUMJUDGES)" & vbCrLf & _
  "  THEN  Add the New Judge(s)  (Increase the value of NUMJUDGES)"
   tbNUMJUDGES.SetFocus
End Sub

Private Sub btnDeleteJun_Click()
  MsgBox " To Decrease the number of Judges assigned, Enter a smaller number for NUMJUDGES"
   tbNUMJUDGES.SetFocus
End Sub

Private Sub btnReAssign_Click()
 On Error GoTo SubError
 
   Instrg = InputBox("Enter Judging Category (JCAT) to Assign OR Re-Assign" & vbCrLf & _
            "IMPORTANT: If you Want to Assign All Categories Using this method" & vbCrLf & _
            "You must verify all categories are assigned before you" & vbcrfl & _
            "print the judges forms!" _
            , "Assign Judges to ONE Category", "")
   If Instrg = "" Then
      MsgBox "Operation Canceled"
      Exit Sub
   Else
     Dim JudgeTy As Recordset
      criteria = "JudgeTypes"
      ' -----------------------Open ALL EXHIBITS------------------------------------------
      Set JudgeTy = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
      With JudgeTy
        .MoveFirst
        Do While Not .EOF
           If Instrg = !JCAT Then GoTo DoTheJcat
       
          .MoveNext
        Loop
      End With
      MsgBox "You entered " & Instrg & ".  This is not an Existing JCAT." & vbcrfl & _
             "Operation Canceled"
      Exit Sub
   End If
DoTheJcat:
   
   JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT = Instrg
   DoAssign = True
   DoOnlyOneJCAT = True   ' used in autoassign to do one one (all in current selection
   CanceledOneCat = True  ' asssume canceled unless set false in btnautoassign_Click
   Call btnAutoAssign_Click
   If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
     If CanceledOneCat = True Then
        ' message already done
     Else
        MsgBox "ERROR: Judge Assignments for " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & " NOT COMPLETE!"
     End If
   Else
     MsgBox "Judge Assignments for " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & " COMPLETE!"
   End If
   DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
   MsgBox "Error in Re-Assign One Exhibit (Filter and prepare) : " & Err.Description
End Sub


Private Sub btnAutoAssign_Click()
  ' Clears the assignments (if DoAssign = True or False on entry)
  ' Assigns Judges (if DoAssign = True on entry)
  
  Dim DidCancel As Boolean
  DidCancel = False
  Dim Instrg As String
  Dim NumJudgesThisCat As Integer
  Dim RndJu As Integer ' an assigned random judge
  Dim ij As Integer
  Dim DoEaCat As Boolean
  'eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
  On Error GoTo SubError1 ' skip JuTyCat close.
DidAllCatsNoErrors = False  ' assume not complete until complete

If DoAssign = True Then
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
  If DoOnlyOneJCAT = True Then
   If MsgBox("CAUTION: DO NOT DO THIS IF SCORE FORMS HAVE BEEN PRINTED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
        "This will CLEAR Judge Assignments THEN Assign New Judges!" & vbCrLf & _
         "**  For ONLY JCAT " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & " ** " & vbCrLf & _
         "For Exhibits with JCAT = " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & ":" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets NumJudges and Judge 1 to Judge 4 = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets SCORE, SCORE_OVERRIDE, TO_STATE = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "For Judges with JCAT = " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & ":" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets NUMEX to 0 " & vbCrLf & _
         "For 'ExhibitJudges' Table where JCAT is " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & "." & vbCrLf & _
         "   Deletes these records " & vbCrLf & _
         "ASSIGNS " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT & " Judges to the selected Exhibits. " & vbCrLf & _
         "Sets NUMEX for Judges in selected Judges Table." & vbCrLf & _
         "Adds the assigned judge's records to the 'ExhibitJudges' Table. " & vbCrLf & _
         "ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
         "Clear the Judge Assignments AND Assign Judges, JCat: " & JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT) = vbNo Then
      MsgBox "Assignments REMAIN AS BEFORE"
      DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
      Exit Sub    ' CancelOnecat remains true
   End If
   CanceledOneCat = False  ' did not cancel so if error exit afte this get correct message
                            ' in btnReAssign_Click()
  Else
   If MsgBox("CAUTION: DO NOT DO THIS IF SCORE FORMS HAVE BEEN PRINTED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
        "This will CLEAR all Judge Assignments THEN Assign New Judges!" & vbCrLf & _
         "**  For ALL Exhibits and JCATS ** " & vbCrLf & _
         "For ALL Exhibits:" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets NumJudges and Judge 1 to Judge 4 = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets SCORE, SCORE_OVERRIDE, TO_STATE = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "For ALL Active Judges:" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Sets NUMEX to 0 " & vbCrLf & _
         "For 'ExhibitJudges' Table:" & vbCrLf & _
         "   Deletes ALL records " & vbCrLf & _
         "ASSIGNS Judges to ALL Exhibits. " & vbCrLf & _
         "Sets NUMEX for Judges (Judges Table)." & vbCrLf & _
         "Adds the assigned judge's records to the 'ExhibitJudges' Table. " & vbCrLf & _
         "ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
         "Clear the Judge Assignments AND Assign Judges, All Exhibits") = vbNo Then
      MsgBox "Assignments REMAIN AS BEFORE"
      DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
      Exit Sub
   End If
 End If
Else
   If MsgBox("CAUTION: DO NOT DO THIS IF SCORE FORMS HAVE BEEN PRINTED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         "This will CLEAR all Judge Assignments!" & vbCrLf & _
         "FOR the ExhibitData Table" & vbCrLf & _
         "  Sets Judge 1 - Judge 4 and NumJudges = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "  Sets SCORE, SCORE_OVERRIDE, TO_STATE Null in ExhibitData = Null" & vbCrLf & _
         "Deletes ALL Records in the ExhibitJudges Table" & vbCrLf & _
         "Sets NUMEX to 0 for ALL Judges in Judges Table" & vbCrLf & _
         "ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
         "Clear the Judge Assignments") = vbNo Then
    MsgBox "Assignments REMAIN AS BEFORE"
    Exit Sub
   End If
End If
  Screen.MousePointer = 11
   ' using opened Exhdata and open judgedata (where active)
   ' clear all assignments
     'EMPTY  the ExhibitJudges Table
      If ExhJudges.RecordCount <> 0 Then
       With ExhJudges
         .MoveFirst
         Do While Not .EOF
           If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
            .Delete
           Else
  '         ' move this into the exhibitdata clear            -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
            ' If !JCAT = JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT Then
            '    .Delete
          
           End If
           .MoveNext
         Loop
       End With
      End If
   ' Clear Entries in the ExhibitData Table
      With ExhData
        If .RecordCount <> 0 Then
         .MoveFirst
         Do While Not .EOF
           If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
             .Edit
             !NUMJUDGES = Null
             !J_1 = Null
             !J_2 = Null
             !J_3 = Null
             !J_4 = Null
             !SCORE_OVERRIDE = False
             !SCORE = Null
             !TO_STATE = Null
             .Update
           Else
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
             If !JCAT = JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT Then
               .Edit
               !NUMJUDGES = Null
               !J_1 = Null
               !J_2 = Null
               !J_3 = Null
               !J_4 = Null
               !SCORE_OVERRIDE = False
               !SCORE = Null
               !TO_STATE = Null
               .Update
               ' delete any records in ExhbibitJudges for this exhibit
               If ExhJudges.RecordCount <> 0 Then
                 With ExhJudges
                    .MoveFirst
                    Do While Not .EOF
                      If !EXN = ExhData!EXN Then
                        .Delete
                      End If
                     .MoveNext
                    Loop
                 End With
               End If
             End If
           End If
           .MoveNext
         Loop
        End If
      End With
   ' set all judges NumEx to 0  (all judges selected at this point)
      With JudgeData
           .MoveFirst
           Do While Not .EOF
           If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
             .Edit
             !NUMEX = 0
             .Update
           Else
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
             If !JCAT = JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT Then
                .Edit
                !NUMEX = 0
                .Update
             End If
           End If
           .MoveNext
           Loop
      End With
Form.Refresh
Screen.MousePointer = 0
If DoAssign = False Then
   DoAssign = True  ' reset to default
   MsgBox "ALL Assignments Cleared"
   Exit Sub
End If
'eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
On Error GoTo SubError
Set JuTyCats = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("JudgeTypes", dbOpenDynaset)
DidAllCatsNoErrors = True ' Assume all done unless error
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
If DoOnlyOneJCAT = False Then
 If MsgBox("Do you want to assign THE SAME NUMBER of Judges to ALL CATEGORIES?", vbYesNo, "Select How To Assign") = vbYes Then
  DoEaCat = False
  Instrg = InputBox("Enter the number of JUDGES PER EXHIBIT?", "Assign Judges - How Many", 3)
  If Instrg <> "" Then
     NumJudgesThisCat = Instrg
  Else
     DidCancel = True
     GoTo CancelExit
  End If
   MsgBox "CLICK OK to Continue" & vbCrLf & "Please be patient - this takes a while!", vbOKOnly, "Proceed with assignments"
 Else
  DoEaCat = True
 End If
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
Else ' DO ONLY ONE = true
  DoEaCat = True    '    Doing only one so skip all but the one selected
End If  ' Do Only ONE
' Open up the JudgeTypes table
' for each JCAT in Judgetypes or in Judgetypecategorie
Screen.MousePointer = 11
Do While Not JuTyCats.EOF '                 MAIN OUTER LOOP  -----------------------------DO JCATS
' local variables
  Dim JCAT As String
  Dim JCATNam As String
  ' To re-assign only one JCAT, enter here
  JCAT = JuTyCats!JCAT
  JCATNam = JuTyCats![JCAT NAME]
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
  If DoOnlyOneJCAT = True Then
    If JCAT <> JCATForDoOnlyOneJCAT Then GoTo SkipJCAT
  End If
  ' Get the Exhibits with this JCAT
  ExhData.Close
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [JCAT] = '" & JCAT & "'"
  Set ExhData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  'If No Exhibits with this JCAT then get next CAT
  ' Rev 5.3.6   ----
  If ExhData.RecordCount = 0 Then GoTo SkipJCAT
  ExhData.MoveLast
  ExhData.MoveFirst
  ' Get the Judges with this JCAT and whose status is Active
  JudgeData.Close
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [Judges] WHERE [STATUS] = 'A' AND [JCAT] = '" & JCAT & "'"
  Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  If JudgeData.RecordCount = 0 Then
     MsgBox " There are no Active Judges with JCAT = " & JCAT & vbcrfl & _
            " There must be enough Judges in each JCAT to Assign Judges!"
     Screen.MousePointer = 0
     DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
     GoTo NoJCATJudge
  End If
  JudgeData.MoveLast
  JudgeData.MoveFirst
  If DoEaCat = True Then
SetNumAgain:
    Screen.MousePointer = 0
    Dim jpe1NE As String ' judges per exhibit = 1, number of exhibits per judge
    Dim jpe2NE As String
    Dim jpe3NE As String
    Dim jpe4NE As String
    Dim inumex As Integer
    Dim inumju As Integer
    Dim NumEpJu As String
    inumex = ExhData.RecordCount
    inumju = JudgeData.RecordCount
    ' at this point
    jpe1NE = IIf(1 > inumju, "N/A", Format(((1 * inumex) / inumju), " 0.0"))
    jpe2NE = IIf(2 > inumju, "N/A", Format(((2 * inumex) / inumju), " 0.0"))
    jpe3NE = IIf(3 > inumju, "N/A", Format(((3 * inumex) / inumju), " 0.0"))
    jpe4NE = IIf(4 > inumju, "N/A", Format(((4 * inumex) / inumju), " 0.0"))
    NumEpJu = "JCAT= " & JCAT & "   " & inumex & " Exhibits,  " & inumju & " Judges. Here are your choices:" & vbCrLf & _
              " 1 Judge  per Exhibit -> " & jpe1NE & " exhibits/judge" & vbCrLf & _
              " 2 Judges per Exhibit -> " & jpe2NE & " exhibits/judge" & vbCrLf & _
              " 3 Judges per Exhibit -> " & jpe3NE & " exhibits/judge" & vbCrLf & _
              " 4 Judges per Exhibit -> " & jpe4NE & " exhibits/judge" & vbCrLf

    Instrg = InputBox(NumEpJu & "How Many JUDGES PER EXHIBIT for JCAT " & JCAT & vbCrLf & _
           JCATNam & vbCrLf & _
           "Enter 0 to skip this category", "Assign Judges - How Many", 3)
    If Instrg <> "" Then
      NumJudgesThisCat = Instrg
    Else
      DidCancel = True
  '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
      If DoOnlyOneJCAT = True Then DoOnlyOneJCAT = False  ' indicates not compelete
      GoTo CancelExit
    End If
    Screen.MousePointer = 11
    If NumJudgesThisCat = 0 Then DidAllCatsNoErrors = False: GoTo SkipJCAT
    If NumJudgesThisCat > 4 Then
       MsgBox "No more than 4 judges allowed"
       GoTo SetNumAgain
    End If
  End If
  If JudgeData.RecordCount < NumJudgesThisCat Then
    Screen.MousePointer = 0
    MsgBox "There are not enough Judges for JCAT = " & JCAT & vbCrLf & _
           "You must Assign at least " & NumJudgesThisCat & " Judges to this JCAT!" & vbCrLf & _
           "Or Assign this category manually. All Exhibits in " & JCAT & " category Skipped"
    Screen.MousePointer = 11
    DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
    '                    -------------------DO ONLY ONE CHECK -------------
    If DoOnlyOneJCAT = True Then
       DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
       GoTo CancelExit
    End If
    GoTo SkipJCAT
  End If
  Screen.MousePointer = 11
  ' for each exhibit with that JCAT, assign judges from the table of active judges
 ' MsgBox "JCAT " & JCAT & ": " & ExhData.RecordCount & " Exhibits,  " & _
 '        JudgeData.RecordCount & " Judges"
  With ExhData
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF   '                                                    LOOP THRU EXHIBITS
      ' for each exhibit with this category:
      ' for each judge to be assigned
        .Edit
        !NUMJUDGES = NumJudgesThisCat
        .Update
        For ij = 1 To NumJudgesThisCat
          curJ1 = IIf(IsNull(!J_1), 1, !J_1)
          curJ2 = IIf(IsNull(!J_2), 1, !J_2)
          curJ3 = IIf(IsNull(!J_3), 1, !J_3)
          curJ4 = IIf(IsNull(!J_4), 1, !J_4)
          RndJu = GetRandJudge(!EXN)
          If RndJu = 1 Then
             Screen.MousePointer = 0
             MsgBox "Judge # 1 is set active! Bad ERROR, Fix and redo this action."
             DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
             DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
             GoTo SubError
          End If
          Select Case ij
            Case 1
               .Edit
               !J_1 = RndJu
               .Update
            Case 2
               .Edit
               !J_2 = RndJu
               .Update
            Case 3
               .Edit
               !J_3 = RndJu
               .Update
            Case 4
               .Edit
               !J_4 = RndJu
               .Update
            Case other
               Screen.MousePointer = 0
               MsgBox "Error: NumjudgesThisCategory must be less than 5 (1 to 4)"
               DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
               DoOnlyOneJCAT = False
               GoTo SubError
          End Select
         Next  ' do next ij   ( judge)
      .MoveNext
    Loop                 '                                                   LOOP THRU EXHIBITS
  End With
SkipJCAT:
  JuTyCats.MoveNext
Loop                       '               MAIN OUTER LOOP  -----------------------------DO JCATS
'  RE opne Data bases I used
CancelExit:  ' OR GOOD EXIT
  If DidCancel = True Then
    Screen.MousePointer = 0
    DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
    MsgBox "Operator canceled - Assignments Incomplete!"
  End If
  If IsObject(JuTyCats) Then JuTyCats.Close
  ExhData.Close
  criteria = "ExhibitData"
  Set ExhData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  If IsObject(JudgeData) Then JudgeData.Close
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [Judges] ORDER BY [JUN]"
  Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Screen.MousePointer = 0
  '   UpDateExhJudges has been fixed for DO ONLY ONE JCAT
  Call UpDateExhJudges
  Screen.MousePointer = 0
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  If IsObject(JuTyCats) Then JuTyCats.Close
SubError1:
  Screen.MousePointer = 0
  DidAllCatsNoErrors = False
  MsgBox "Error in btnAutoAssign: " & Err.Description & "JCAT " & JCAT
NoJCATJudge:
  If IsObject(ExhData) Then ExhData.Close
  criteria = "ExhibitData"
  Set ExhData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  If IsObject(JudgeData) Then JudgeData.Close
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [Judges] ORDER BY [JUN]"
  Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  ' update any changes to Exhibitdata
  Call UpDateExhJudges
End Sub



Private Sub btnClearAssigns_Click()
    DoAssign = False
    RedoOnlyOneJCAT = False
    Call btnAutoAssign_Click
End Sub


Private Function IsJUNActive(judnum As Integer) As Boolean
   'This should be call only if trying to put a jun into the exhibit form
   ' J_1 J_2 et.   because it allows JUN = Null  (no judge)
   On Error GoTo FuncError
   If IsNull(judnum) Then
     IsJUNActive = True  '  Judge 1 indicates not assigned
     Exit Function
   End If
   With JudgeData
      .MoveFirst
      .FindFirst ("JUN = " & judnum)
      If .NoMatch Then
        IsJUNActive = False
        MsgBox "No Such Judge"
      Else
        Dim a As Integer
        a = !JUN
        If !STATUS = "A" Then
          ' a check that JUN = 1 must not be active
            If judnum = 1 Then
               MsgBox "JUN = 1 is set to active and SHOULD NOT BE ACTIVE" & vbCrLf & _
                " JUN 1 will now be set to Inactive and JCAT set to null!" & vbCrLf & _
                " ENTER A BLANK TO UN-ASSIGN THIS JUDGE!"
                .Edit
                !STATUS = Null
                !JCAT = Null
                .Update
                IsJUNActive = False
                Exit Function
            End If
           IsJUNActive = True
        Else
           IsJUNActive = False
           If judnum = 1 Then
             MsgBox "ENTER A BLANK TO UN-ASSIGN THIS JUDGE!"
             IsJUNActive = False
             Exit Function
           End If
           MsgBox "Judge is NOT Active"
        End If
      End If
   End With
   Exit Function
FuncError:
   IsJUNActive = False
End Function





Private Sub cbEXN_AfterUpdate()
    ' Find the record that matches the control.
   On Error GoTo SubError
    If (IsNull(cbEXN)) Then
       'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
       'cbEXN.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    Me.Recordset.FindFirst "EXN = " & Str(Me![cbEXN])
    Me.cbEXN = Null
    'Me.cbFindStudent = Null
Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub



Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  'msgbox "Formload"
'  Dim promptmsg As String
'  Dim instrg As String
  'tbFormName = "Judge Assignments "
  ' Build a string to put in the inputbox as a prompt to user
  '  Stings are in quotes unless you use a string variable or constant
  '  promptmsg is a string variable,
  '  Note to continue on next line here, use the underscore character '_'
  '  the vbCrLf means go to a new line when the message is displayed
  '  the '&' character adds the strings together. you could use a + sign also
'  promptmsg = "Enter Sort Order  --- " & vbCrLf & _
'     " A = All Exhibits (default)" & vbCrLf & _
'     " U = Un-Assigned Exhibits and Exhibits with Incomplete Assignments" & vbCrLf & _
'     " M = Exhibits with Incomplete Assignments" & vbCrLf & _
'     " D = Done - Exhibits with complete Assignments " & vbCrLf
'  instrg = UCase(InputBox(promptmsg, "National Categories Summary Report", "A"))
'  Me.Filter = ""
'  If Len(instrg) = 0 Then instrg = "A"
'  If UCase(Mid(instrg, 1, 1)) = "A" Then
'    tbFormName = tbFormName & " Showing All Exhibits "
'    Me.Filter = ""
'  End If
'  If UCase(Mid(instrg, 1, 1)) = "U" Then
'    tbFormName = tbFormName & " Showing Unassigned & Incomplete Exhibits "
'    Me.Filter = "[NUMJUDGES] = Null"
'  End If
'  If UCase(Mid(instrg, 1, 1)) = "M" Then
'    tbFormName = tbFormName & " Showing Incomplete Exhibits Only "
'    Me.Filter = "[NUMJUDGES] = Null"
'  End If
'  If UCase(Mid(instrg, 1, 1)) = "D" Then
'    tbFormName = tbFormName & " Showing ONLY Fully Assigned Exhibits "
'    Me.Filter = "[NUMJUDGES] = Not Null"
'  End If
' example criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
'                    " ORDER BY [SCH_CODE]"
On Error GoTo SubError
Dim DidRecLTNum As Boolean
Dim DidRecGTNum As Boolean
Dim DidJunNE As Boolean
Dim DidSomeNotAssigned As Boolean
Dim DidJunNull As Boolean
Dim DidNoJunMatch As Boolean
Dim FoundCase As Boolean
Dim hadError As Boolean
Dim msg As String
Dim tJCAT As String
Dim tNCAT As String
Dim tEXN As String
Dim TjunNum As Integer
DoAssign = True  ' (default)  set false by clear button - used to see if clear or auto assign
Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
criteria = "ExhibitData"
' -----------------------Open ALL EXHIBITS------------------------------------------
Set ExhData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitJudges] ORDER BY [EXN]"
' open the ExhibitJudges table
' ----------------------Open the ExhibitJudges Table (one record for each score form)
Set ExhJudges = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
criteria = "SELECT * FROM [Judges] ORDER BY [JUN]"  ' Get all judges, active and non active
' Verify all data in ExhibitData to ExhibitJudges
' ----------------------Open ALL JUDGES (ACTIVE AND NON-ACTIVE (for now)
Set JudgeData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
'ExhJudges.MoveFirst  ' this table may be empty  so this would fail
MsgBox "USE JCAT Exhibits&Judges Counts QRY (QUERY) to verify " & vbCrLf & _
        "there are enough Judges in each JCAT category!  " & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
        "Click OK to continue preparing for Judge Assignments (or changes)." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
       "MANY CHECKS TO VERIFY DATA INTEGRITY WILL BE MADE" & vbCrLf & _
       "BE PATIENT, THIS WILL TAKE A WHILE!", vbOKOnly, "Loading Judge Assignment"

If ExhJudges.EOF Then
  ' do nothing This table will be empty until we assign some judges
End If

If ExhData.EOF Then
  MsgBox "No Exhibits! Judge Assignments aborted"
  Cancel = True
  Exit Sub
End If
If JudgeData.EOF Then
  MsgBox "No Judges! Judge Assignments aborted"
  Cancel = True
  Exit Sub
End If
' '    Open Categories and Judgetypes for checks versus Exhits or Judges
Set JuTyCats = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("JudgeTypeCategories", dbOpenDynaset)
Set Categories = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("Categories", dbOpenDynaset)
Set JudgeTypes = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("JudgeTypes", dbOpenDynaset)

'' -------------------------------------   do checks on Judge Data
With JudgeData
 .FindFirst ("[STATUS] = 'A'")
 If .NoMatch Then
   MsgBox "No Active Judges! Judge assignments aborted"
   Cancel = True
   Exit Sub
 End If
  '  rev 5.3.2
 .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'L'")
 If Not .NoMatch Then
   MsgBox "Caution! Judges with status 'L' will NOT be assigned."
 End If
 .MoveFirst
 .FindFirst ("JUN = 1")
 If .NoMatch Then
   MsgBox "You must have a Judge with JUN = 1.  This Judge Number is used as a place holder in this form." & vbCrLf & _
   "Set the name of JUN 1 to 'Override, Chair' or 'Holder, Place'" & vbCrLf & _
   "Set the STATUS to 'Blank' (NOT Active)"
   Cancel = True
   Exit Sub
 End If
 hadError = False
 Do While Not .EOF
   If Not IsNull(!STATUS) Then
    If Asc(!STATUS) = Asc("a") Then
         msg = "Judge " & !JUN & ": Judges Status not Capital 'A'"
         hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
    End If
    If !STATUS = "A" Then ' CHECK ACTIVE JUDGES ONLY --------------------
     ' Tests on SFJM
        If IsNull(!JUN) Then
         msg = "Active Judge with NO Judge Number"
         hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If !JUN > 9999 Then
         msg = "Judges Jun " & !JUN & " > 9999"
         hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
        End If

        If !JUN < 100 Then
          If !JUN <> 2 Then  ' JUN = 1 is place holder or score override etc.
              msg = "Still Need?????Judges Jun " & !JUN & " < 100"
              hadError = True
              GoTo FieldError
          Else  ' judge 1 must not be active
            If !STATUS = "A" Or !STATUS = "a" Then
              msg = "Judges Jun " & !JUN & " STATUS is Active =MUST be BLANK"
              hadError = True
              GoTo FieldError
            End If
          End If
        End If
        If IsNull(!JCAT) Then
         msg = "Judge " & !JUN & ": JCAT NOT SET" & vbCrLf & _
               "Check all Judges have JCAT set!"
         hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If Mid(!JCAT, 1, 1) <> "S" And Mid(!JCAT, 1, 1) <> "J" Then
          msg = "Judge " & !JUN & ": JCAT First Character Not S or J"
          hadError = True
          GoTo FieldError
        End If
        tJCAT = !JCAT
        TjunNum = !JUN
        With JuTyCats
          ' See if judge JCAT is in the judgetypecategories  table
          .FindFirst ("JCAT = '" & tJCAT & "'")
          If .NoMatch Then
              msg = "Judges Jun " & TjunNum & " JCAT " & tJCAT & " Not in JudgeTypeCategories"
              hadError = True
             GoTo FieldError
          Else  ' it is so see if entry in categories table
            tNCAT = !NCAT
            With Categories
              .FindFirst ("NCAT = '" & tNCAT & "'")
              If .NoMatch Then
                msg = "JudgeTypeCategories JCAT " & !tJCAT & " Not in Categories Table"
                hadError = True
                GoTo FieldError
              End If
            End With
          End If
        End With
        With JudgeTypes ' and see if JCAT is int eh judgetype table
          .FindFirst ("JCAT = '" & tJCAT & "'")
          If .NoMatch Then
              msg = "Judges Jun " & !JUN & " JCAT " & tJCAT & " Not in JudgeTypes Table"
              hadError = True
             GoTo FieldError
          End If
        End With
    End If
   End If
    .MoveNext
 Loop
'  Do checks  on Exhibit Data
'  is FYR set and valid etc
msg = ""
hadError = False
With ExhData
 Do While Not .EOF
      ' Do not check if not a student exhibit ( exhibits < 100 are special awards)
      If Val(!EXN) > 9999 Then
        msg = "Maximum Exhibit Number Too Large for EXN = " & !EXN
        hadError = True
        GoTo FieldError
      End If
      If Val(!EXN) >= 100 And _
         Val(!EXN) <= 9999 Then
      '  If Len(!Exn) <> 4 Then
      '   msg = "SFEM Exh " & !Exn & " Not 4 Characters. Check Leading '0'?"
      '   GoTo fielderror
      '  End If
        If IsNull(!FYR) Then
          msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": FYR Null"
              hadError = True
          GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If !FYR <> FairYear() Then
          msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": FYR not all = " & FairYear()
           hadError = True
           GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If !NUMJUDGES > 4 Then
          msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": NUMJUDGES is greater than '4'"
           hadError = True
           GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If IsNull(!JCAT) Then
         msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": ExhibitData Missing JCAT" & vbcrfl & _
               " Check all Exhibits for JCAT!"
              hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If Mid(!JCAT, 1, 1) <> "S" And Mid(!JCAT, 1, 1) <> "J" Then
          msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": ExhibitData JCAT First Letter not S or J" & vbCrLf & _
                " Also check Categories, JudgeTypes, and JudgeTypeCategories Tables."
              hadError = True
          GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If IsNull(!NCAT) Then
         msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": ExhibitData Missing NCAT"
              hadError = True
         GoTo FieldError
        End If
        If Mid(!NCAT, 1, 1) <> "S" And Mid(!NCAT, 1, 1) <> "J" Then
          msg = "Exhibit " & !EXN & ": ExhibitData NCAT DIV not S or J" & vbCrLf & _
          " Also check Categories and JudgeTypeCategories Tables."
              hadError = True
          GoTo FieldError
        End If
        tJCAT = !JCAT
        tNCAT = !NCAT
        tEXN = !EXN
        'IS exhibit jcat in jutycategories
        With JuTyCats
          .FindFirst ("JCAT = '" & tJCAT & "'")
          If .NoMatch Then
              msg = "Exhibit Exn  " & tEXN & " JCAT " & tJCAT & " Not in JudgeTypeCategories"
              hadError = True
             GoTo FieldError
          Else
            ' IT is... so see if exhibit number in correct range for this ncat
            With Categories
              .FindFirst ("NCAT = '" & tNCAT & "'")  ' The NCAT in the Exhibit
              If .NoMatch Then
              msg = "Exhibit Exn  " & tEXN & " NCAT " & tNCAT & " Not in Categories Table"
                hadError = True
                GoTo FieldError
              Else  ''' found the  NCAT so NOW check the range
                If tEXN > !LAST_EX Or tEXN < !FIRST_EX Then
                   msg = "Exhibit Exn  " & tEXN & " Not in Allowed Exhibit Range SET in Categories Table"
                   hadError = True
                   GoTo FieldError
                End If
              End If
            End With
          End If
        End With
       End If  ' if between firststudent and laststudent exnums
  .MoveNext
 Loop
End With
'    Do other checks

FieldError:
   If hadError = True Then
    MsgBox msg
    Cancel = True
    Exit Sub
  End If
End With
'  -------------------------------- end of checks that force Cancel ------------------
' close the test recordsets
JuTyCats.Close
Categories.Close
JudgeTypes.Close
' -------------------- Check Match of ExhibitData to ExhibitJudges ETC ------
DidSomeNotAssigned = False
DidRecLTNum = False
DidRecGTNum = False
DidJunNE = False
DidJunNull = False
FoundCase = False
DidNoJunMatch = False
ExhData.MoveFirst
If Not ExhData.EOF Then
  Do While Not ExhData.EOF
    curExn = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!EXN), 0, ExhData!EXN)
    curNumJu = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!NUMJUDGES), 0, ExhData!NUMJUDGES)
    curJ1 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_1), 0, ExhData!J_1)
    curJ2 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_2), 0, ExhData!J_2)
    curJ3 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_3), 0, ExhData!J_3)
    curJ4 = IIf(IsNull(ExhData!J_4), 0, ExhData!J_4)
    If curNumJu = 0 Then
             If DidSomeNotAssigned = False Then
               DidSomeNotAssigned = True
               MsgBox "Some or All Exhibits have NOT BEEN ASSIGNED JUDGES" & vbCrLf & _
                     "All Exhibits must be assigned prior to printing SCORE FORMS" & vbCrLf & _
                     "IF LATE EXHIBITS have been added, use the 'Assign New Exhibits' button."
              End If
    End If
    
    ' ---Find number of records in ExhibitJudges for current exhibit number---
    Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
    If Num_records <> curNumJu Then
      If Num_records < curNumJu Then
      ' Notify the operator but do not add the record
          If DidRecLTNum = False Then
            DidRecLTNum = True
            MsgBox "ERROR: ExhibitData NUMJUDGES is GREATER THAN the number of records in ExhibitJudges Table" & vbCrLf & _
            "for ONE OR MORE Exhibits! YOU MUST re-assign all judges or fix these problems manually!" & vbCrLf & _
            "THIS ERROR WAS PROBABLY INTRODUCED BY EDITING TABLES OR CHANGING JUDGE ASSIGNMENTS WITHOUT USING THIS FORM!" _
            & vbCrLf & vbcrl & _
            "The FIRST exhibit with this problem has EXN = " & curExn & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
            "CLICK OK to continue loading the Form for Judge Assignments"
          End If
      End If
      ' If Num_records > NUMJUDGES then notify operator
      If Num_records > curNumJu Then
       ' Notify the operator but do not delete any records
          If DidRecGTNum = False Then
            DidRecGTNum = True
            MsgBox "ERROR: ExhibitData NUMJUDGES is LESS THAN the number of records in ExhibitJudges Table" & vbCrLf & _
            "for ONE OR MORE Exhibits! YOU MUST re-assign all judges or fix these problems manually!" & vbCrLf & _
            "THIS ERROR WAS PROBABLY INTRODUCED BY EDITING TABLES OR CHANGING JUDGE ASSIGNMENTS WITHOUT USING THIS FORM!" _
            & vbCrLf & vbcrl & _
            "The FIRST exhibit with this problem has EXN = " & curExn & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
            "CLICK OK to continue loading the Form for Judge Assignments"
          End If
      End If
    End If
    ' ------------------------------------
    
    If Num_records = curNumJu And curNumJu > 0 Then
    ' Check that judge numbers in ExhibitJudges match Exhibit Data
     With ExhJudges
      .MoveFirst
       If Not ExhJudges.EOF Then ' just opened should not be EOF unless empty
          Dim recnu As Integer
          recnum = 1
          Do While Not .EOF
             If !EXN = curExn Then
             ' Records in ExhibitJudges will normally but not always be in order of Judges in ExhibitData
              If IsNull(!JUN) Then
                 'This is an error
                 If DidJunNull = False Then
                    DidJunNull = True
                    MsgBox "ERROR: An ExhibitJudges Table record contains a Null Judge! " & vbCrLf & _
                 "for ONE OR MORE Exhibits! YOU MUST re-assign all judges or fix these problems manually!" & vbCrLf & _
                 "THIS ERROR WAS PROBABLY INTRODUCED BY EDITING TABLES OR CHANGING JUDGE ASSIGNMENTS WITHOUT USING THIS FORM!" _
                  & vbCrLf & vbcrl & _
                  "The FIRST exhibit with this problem has EXN = " & curExn & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
                  "CLICK OK to continue loading the Form for Judge Assignments"
                 End If
              ' see if JUN matches one of the Judges in ExhibitData
              Else  ' not null see if matches one of the judges in ExhibitData
                Dim ijk As Integer
                For ijk = 1 To curNumJu
                  Select Case ijk
                    Case 1
                      If curJ1 = !JUN Then GoTo FoundJU
                    Case 2
                      If curJ2 = !JUN Then GoTo FoundJU
                    Case 3
                      If curJ3 = !JUN Then GoTo FoundJU
                    Case 4
                      If curJ4 = !JUN Then GoTo FoundJU
                    Case Else
                  End Select
                Next
                ' if get here had no match
                If DidNoJunMatch = False Then
                    DidNoJunMatch = True
                    MsgBox "ERROR: A Judge in the ExhibitJudges Table DOES NOT MATCH any Judge in and the Exhibit " & vbCrLf & _
                 "for ONE OR MORE Exhibits! YOU MUST re-assign all judges or fix these problems manually!" & vbCrLf & _
                 "THIS ERROR WAS PROBABLY INTRODUCED BY EDITING TABLES OR CHANGING JUDGE ASSIGNMENTS WITHOUT USING THIS FORM!" _
                  & vbCrLf & vbcrl & _
                  "The FIRST exhibit with this problem has EXN = " & curExn & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
                  "CLICK OK to continue loading the Form for Judge Assignments"
                End If
FoundJU:
              End If
              ' See if jundges in ExhibitJudges are in same order as judges in the exhibit
              Select Case recnum
                Case 1
                   If IIf(IsNull(!JUN), 0, !JUN) <> curJ1 Then FoundCase = True
                Case 2
                   If IIf(IsNull(!JUN), 0, !JUN) <> curJ2 Then FoundCase = True
                Case 3
                   If IIf(IsNull(!JUN), 0, !JUN) <> curJ3 Then FoundCase = True
                Case 4
                   If IIf(IsNull(!JUN), 0, !JUN) <> curJ4 Then FoundCase = True
                Case other
                    ' already did this check - NUMJUDGES > 4
                End Select
                If FoundCase = True Then
                  If DidJunNE = False Then
                    DidJunNE = True
                    MsgBox "NOTE - INFORMATION ONLY:" & vbCrLf & _
                    "ExhibitJudges Table records are NOT in same Order as Judges in ExhibitsData Table " & vbCrLf & _
                   "for ONE OR MORE Exhibits! This is NOT an Error, just not usual. Probably caused by" & vbCrLf & _
                    "Editing or Sorting Tables in other applications." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
                   "The FIRST exhibit with this situation is EXN = " & curExn & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
                   "CLICK OK to continue loading the Form for Judge Assignments"
                   End If
                End If
              recnum = recnum + 1
             End If
           .MoveNext
         Loop
      End If
     End With
    End If
    ExhData.MoveNext
  Loop
 End If
 lblRevision.Caption = "Rev " & Revision()
 Form.Refresh
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  Dim errnum As Double
  errnum = Err.Number
  If Err.Number = 3201 Then
     MsgBox Err.Description & vbCrLf & _
     "Error in Data. Check that there a Judge with JUN = 1 (Dummy judge for Not Assigned or Overrides) in Judges Table"
  Else
    If Err.Number = 3021 Then
       MsgBox "No records of Selected type:  " & vbCrLf & Err.Description
    Else
       MsgBox Err.Description & " in Form Open"
    End If
  End If
  Exit Sub
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Close()
 ExhJudges.Close
 ExhData.Close
 JudgeData.Close
 MsgBox "Now would be a good time to order new print cartridges for the scanners - and install them." & vbCrLf & _
        "Last year's cartridges will be dried out and will not work.New but 'Expired' cartridges will not work." & vbCrLf & _
        "" & vbCrLf & _
        "Now would also be a good time to enter each categories allocations for the State Fair!" & vbCrLf & _
        " Place the number of exhibits allocated in the N_TO_STATE field of the Categories Table." & vbCrLf & _
        " You can always update the entries later - if they change."
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
'' ----
End Sub



Private Sub tbJ_1_AfterUpdate()
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_1_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Cancel = False
  
  ' ------------ CHANGE A JUDGE NUMBER ---------------
  ' This should occure in the ExhibitJudges record in the sub form, not in the ExhibitData form
  ' See of this judge exists or if judge exists, is it active. Messages in IsJUNActive()
  If Not IsNull(tbJ_1) Then
    If IsJUNActive(tbJ_1) = False Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If
' Find Num_records = number of records in ExhibitJudges for the Exhibit displayed
 curExn = Form![ExhibitData.EXN]
 Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
 If (Num_records >= 1) And (Num_records = tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   With ExhJudges
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      If curExn = !EXN Then
        ' first record so update
        .Edit
        !JUN = IIf(IsNull(tbJ_1), 1, tbJ_1)
        .Update
        Exit Do
      End If
     .MoveNext
   Loop
   End With
 Else
    If IsNull(tbJ_1) Then Exit Sub  ' ok to enter null
    MsgBox "Error, J_1 entry!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Num records in ExhibitJudges not = NUMJUDGES or" & vbCrLf & _
          "NUMJUDGES is less than 1!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Change NUMJUDGES or make no entry for J_1"
    Cancel = True
 End If
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "No such Judge. "
  Cancel = True
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_2_AfterUpdate()
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_2_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Cancel = False
  ' See of this judge exists or if judge exists, is it active. Messages in IsJUNActive()
  If Not IsNull(tbJ_2) Then
    If IsJUNActive(tbJ_2) = False Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If
' Find Num_records = number of records in ExhibitJudges for the Exhibit displayed
 curExn = Form![ExhibitData.EXN]
 Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
 If (Num_records >= 2) And (Num_records = tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   With ExhJudges
   Dim count As Integer
   count = 1
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      If curExn = !EXN Then
        If count = 2 Then
          .Edit
          !JUN = IIf(IsNull(tbJ_2), 1, tbJ_2)
          .Update
          Exit Do
        End If
        count = count + 1
      End If
      'ount = count + 1
     .MoveNext
   Loop
   End With
 Else
   If IsNull(tbJ_2) Then Exit Sub  ' ok to enter null
   MsgBox "Error, J_2 entry!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Num records in ExhibitJudges not = NUMJUDGES or" & vbCrLf & _
          "NUMJUDGES is less than 2!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Change NUMJUDGES or make no entry for J_2"
    Cancel = True
 End If
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "No such Judge. "
  Cancel = True
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_3_AfterUpdate()
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_3_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
 On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See of this judge exists or if judge exists, is it active. Messages in IsJUNActive()
  If Not IsNull(tbJ_3) Then
    If IsJUNActive(tbJ_3) = False Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If ' Find Num_records = number of records in ExhibitJudges for the Exhibit displayed
 curExn = Form![ExhibitData.EXN]
 Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
 If (Num_records >= 3) And (Num_records = tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   With ExhJudges
   Dim count As Integer
   count = 1
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      If curExn = !EXN Then
        If count = 3 Then
          .Edit
          !JUN = IIf(IsNull(tbJ_3), 1, tbJ_3)
          .Update
          Exit Do
        End If
        count = count + 1
      End If
     .MoveNext
   Loop
   End With
 Else
    If IsNull(tbJ_3) Then Exit Sub  ' ok to enter null
    MsgBox "Error, J_3 entry!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Num records in ExhibitJudges not = NUMJUDGES or" & vbCrLf & _
          "NUMJUDGES is less than 3!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Change NUMJUDGES or make no entry for J_3"
    Cancel = True  ' leave in box, user must change
    End If
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "No such Judge. "
  Cancel = True
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_4_AfterUpdate()
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub tbJ_4_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
 On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See of this judge exists or if judge exists, is it active. Messages in IsJUNActive()
  If Not IsNull(tbJ_4) Then
    If IsJUNActive(tbJ_4) = False Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If ' Find Num_records = number of records in ExhibitJudges for the Exhibit displayed
 curExn = Form![ExhibitData.EXN]
 Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
 If (Num_records >= 4) And (Num_records = tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   With ExhJudges
   Dim count As Integer
   count = 1
   .MoveFirst
   Do While Not .EOF
      If curExn = !EXN Then
        If count = 4 Then
          .Edit
          !JUN = IIf(IsNull(tbJ_4), 1, tbJ_4)
          .Update
          Exit Do
        End If
        count = count + 1
      End If
     .MoveNext
   Loop
   End With
 Else
   If IsNull(tbJ_4) Then Exit Sub  ' ok to enter null
   MsgBox "Error, J_4 entry!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Num records in ExhibitJudges not = NUMJUDGES or" & vbCrLf & _
          "NUMJUDGES is less than 4!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Change NUMJUDGES or make no entry for J_4"
    Cancel = True
 End If
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "No such Judge. "
  Cancel = True
End Sub


Private Sub tbNUMJUDGES_AfterUpdate()
  Form.Refresh
End Sub

Private Sub tbNUMJUDGES_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
 'Dim ExhJudges As Recordset
 ' find if any records in Exhibits Judges Table
 'Dim Num_records As Integer
 'Dim criteria As String
 'Dim ii As Integer
 'Dim curExn As Integer
' Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
' example criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
'                    " ORDER BY [SCH_CODE]"
' criteria = "ExhibitJudges"
' open the ExhibitJudges table
' Set ExhJudges = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
 'MsgBox "count = " & ExhJudges.RecordCount & " Entered: " & NUMJUDGES
' Find Num_records = number of records in ExhibitJudges for the Exhibit displayed
 On Error GoTo SubError
 Dim DoExhibitUpdate As Boolean
 DoExhibitUpdate = False '  this is set true if we increase or decrease NUMJUDGES
 curExn = Form![ExhibitData.EXN]
 If IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) > 4 Then
   MsgBox "Maximum number of Judges = 4"
   Cancel = True
   Exit Sub
 End If
 If tbNUMJUDGES = 0 Then
   MsgBox "Enter 'Blank' to remove all judges"
   Cancel = True
   Exit Sub
 End If
 Num_records = ExnRecords(curExn)
' If Num_records = NUMJUDGES then do nothing
 If Num_records = IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   ' Change it since is same as num records in ExhibitJudges
   Exit Sub
 End If
' If Num_records < NUMJUDGES, create NUMJUDGES - Num_records with JUN = Null or blank
If Num_records < IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) Then
   With ExhJudges
     Dim OldNumRecords As Integer
     OldNumRecords = Num_records
     For ii = 1 To IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) - OldNumRecords
     ' get a judge number
     Dim GetJu As String
GetADifNumber:
     GetJu = InputBox("CAUTION: DO NOT DO THIS IF SCORE FORMS HAVE BEEN PRINTED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
             "Enter Judge Number ('Active' With JCAT same as Exhibit)" & vbCrLf & _
             "Note: List will not update until you complete addition(s)." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
              "Click Cancel to Abort", "New Judge Assignment", "0")
        If GetJu = "" Then
          ' pressed cancel
           Cancel = True
           Exit Sub
        End If
      ' see if same cat and active
        With JudgeData
          .FindFirst ("JUN = " & GetJu)
          If .NoMatch Then
             MsgBox "No Such Judge"
             GoTo GetADifNumber
          End If
          If !STATUS <> "A" Then
             MsgBox "Not Active"
             GoTo GetADifNumber
          End If
        End With
     'good, so add it
       .AddNew
       !EXN = curExn
       !JUN = GetJu        ' old way added Judge number 1 .
       !FYR = FairYear()
       .Update
       Num_records = Num_records + 1
       Call UpDateExhData
     Next
    ' Num_records = IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES)
    'DoExhibitUpdate = True
   End With
End If
 ' If Num_records > NUMJUDGES then ask operator if it is OK to delete the first one or more of the
 '     judges for the Exhibits data listed below this form

If Num_records > IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) Then
GetADifNumberDel:
    GetJu = InputBox("CAUTION: DO NOT DO THIS IF SCORE FORMS HAVE BEEN PRINTED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
            "Enter Judge Number to Delete (In the List Below)" & vbCrLf & _
            "Note: List will not update until you complete deletion(s)." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
              "Click Cancel to Abort", "Remove Judge Assignment", "0")
        If GetJu = "" Then
          ' pressed cancel
           Cancel = True
           Exit Sub
        End If
      With ExhJudges
         .MoveFirst
         Do While Not .EOF
              If !EXN = curExn Then
                 If !JUN = GetJu Then
                   .Delete
                    'Form.Refresh
                   Num_records = Num_records - 1
                   Call UpDateExhData
                   
                   If Num_records = IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) Then
                        Exit Do
                   Else
                        GoTo GetADifNumberDel
                   End If
                 End If
              End If
              .MoveNext
         Loop
         If Num_records <> IIf(IsNull(tbNUMJUDGES), 0, tbNUMJUDGES) Then
           ' did not find the entered judge in JudgesExhibit table
           MsgBox "Judge Already Deleted or Not In List Below)"
           GoTo GetADifNumberDel
         End If
      End With
End If
Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "Program error in sub tbNUMJUDGES_BeforeUpdate: " & Err.Description
End Sub
